thread.section_title: Kim Kardashian News Plus Instagram and Snapchat Updates | Daily Mail Online
thread.title: retweets suggestion Kanye performs halftime
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian retweets suggestion Kanye performs halftime | Daily Mail Online

author: Sarah Jones For Dailymail.com
title: retweets suggestion Kanye performs halftime
text:
She attended a Super Bowl party earlier in the day with her rapper husband.
And hours later Kim Kardashian retweeted a post that suggested Kanye West perform at next year's Super Bowl halftime show.
'Never too early. #KanyeForSuperbowl52,' a fan site dedicated to the Love Lockdown hit-maker posted which the 36-year-old reality star shared.
'Never too early': Kim Kardashian retweeted a post suggesting husband Kanye West perform the halftime show at next year's Super Bowl
'Kanye for Super Bowl 52': Another user also posted in support of Kanye which Kim retweeted during the Super Bowl game
The original post by TeamKanyeDaily received comments ranging from 'I need kanyebowl,' to 'Let's get the campaign going now,' and 'Yes plz We need to make this happen!!!!'
However, some were not so pleased with the idea as replies included 'No thanks,' 'that would be the worst half time show ever,' and 'Don't bother, he wouldn't show up.'
Lady Gaga performed an outstanding halftime show which received rave reviews from stars and fans alike.
Katy Perry performed at halftime two years ago and she loved the performance as Quote: : 'I want jumping gifs stat! Bravo @ladygaga.'
Super Bowl Sunday! Kim Kardashian carried daughter North into a party to celebrate the huge sporting event in Brentwood
Doting dad! Kanye West carried one-year-old Saint, who wore a mini velour tracksuit
Bruno Mars has also been a featured performer in recent years as Quote: : '@ladygaga you killed that!!!!'
Gaga even happened to turn casual fans into huge fans including action man Chris Pratt.
The 37-year-old Guardians Of The Galaxy star shared: 'Dancing hard. Singing live. Ends it catching a football! I always liked #Gaga. Now I love her. Sorry not sorry. That was freakin' awesome.'
She put on a jaw-dropping production at the Super Bowl LI which saw the New England Patriots defeat the Atlanta Falcons.
Showstopper! Lady Gaga performed an outstanding halftime show which received rave reviews from stars and fans alike
Tom Brady led the team to victory in an epic game that went into the biggest sporting event's first ever overtime.
Meanwhile Kim - who has denied new claims her marriage to Kanye is over - recently faced speculation that her union is on the rocks once again.
But the couple - who tied the knot in 2014 - showed no signs of troubles when they headed into a party to watch the big game in Brentwood on Sunday.
Dressed in a themed Super Bowl outfit, North's gave a cheeky smile as they walked inside, along with Kanye and baby Saint.
Loved up: Meanwhile Kim - who has denied new claims her marriage to Kanye is over - recently faced speculation that her union is on the rocks once again but showed no signs of troubles on Sunday
